column2: sf_map <- get_map(location = c(left = -122.5601, bottom = 37.6993, right = -122.3167, top = 37.8116), zoom = 14 , color = "color")
geom_point(data = Prunus, aes(x =longitude, y =latitude,label = species, label1=address, label2 = dbh, label3 = date), size=1.1, alpha = 0.45, shape = 1, color = "red") +
plot1 <- ggplotly(sf_plot, height = 450, width=900, tooltip = c("species","address", "dbh", "date"))
